list_definition.definition: (in the army, navy etc) a person’s position of importance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was promoted to the rank of sergeant/colonel.

list_definition.definition: a line or row (especially of soldiers or taxis)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a taxi rank just outside the station.
The officer ordered the front rank to fire.

list_definition.definition: to have, or give, a place in a group, according to importance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I would rank him among our greatest writers
Apes rank above dogs in intelligence.
The race was won by a rank outsider.
